title: Margoon Waterfall
content: The grand waterfall of Margoon in Fars province is one of Iranâ€™s most famous waterfalls which the greenery and beauty of its surroundings have made it more graceful. Komehr River falls over this waterfall. What characterizes this waterfall is the many separate series of water falling from it. These series each have formed a narrow groove on the wall of the waterfall. The height of the waterfall is about 70m, and its width reaches to about 100m. Plants and moss(es) on its wall has created a beautiful scenery.
